pre_text_caption_evidence: at december 31 , 2012 , the gross reserves for a&e losses were comprised of $ 138449 thousand representing case reserves reported by ceding companies , $ 90637 thousand representing additional case reserves established by the company on assumed reinsurance claims , $ 36667 thousand representing case reserves established by the company on direct excess insurance claims , including mt .
mckinley , and $ 177068 thousand representing ibnr reserves .

with respect to asbestos only , at december 31 , 2012 , the company had gross asbestos loss reserves of $ 422849 thousand , or 95.5% ( 95.5 % ) , of total a&e reserves , of which $ 339654 thousand was for assumed business and $ 83195 thousand was for direct business .
